## EZ899-240187: Immigration Holding Centre Gate Replacement

### Solicitation Details
* Ref Number: WS4164648633
* Publication Date:  August 25, 2023
* Closing Date for Tenders: September 11, 2023 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date:  October 10, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date:  March 8, 2024

### Solicitation Information
* Tender Status: Expired
* Notice Type: Invitation to Qualify
* Procurement method: Competitive
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Services to be Provided
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issues this solicitation for the replacement of the main perimeter gates at the Immigration Holding Centre in Surrey, BC. Work will include the provision of all labour, materials, services, and equipment necessary for the replacement of the existing gates with new gates.

Services to be provided include:

* Demolition of existing gates
* Structural foundation for new gates
* Electrical Power and Security System Installation

Additionally, paving remediation will be required as a result of the new gate installation.

### Location of Work
The work will take place at the Immigration Holding Centre located at 13130 76th Avenue, Surrey, BC. The work is expected to be carried out in phases to ensure the security of the perimeter is maintained.

### Contact Information
Simon Leung is the contact person for this solicitation, who can be reached via simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
